ComicInfo.Summary: Untitled: Grifter spurns Badrock's incessant requests of forming a partnership with him until Dr. McCall shows up and tells the duo that his wife (Badrock's mother and Grifter's former lover) has been captured by the Covenant of the Sword (again).
